column1: 11.  The  appellant,  being  a  Government  Servant  and  an  Excise  Guard

gratification between the period of 03-04-2012 and 30-04-2012 to not
to prosecute him for having White Beedi in his possession, and thereby
committed  an  offence  punishable  in  terms  of  section  16(b)  of  the
12.  At the same time and at the same transaction mentioned in count 11,
the appellant  accepted  a  gratification  of  Rs.  3000/=  from  the  earlier
mentioned Lionel,  and  thereby  committed  an  offence  punishable  in
terms of section 19(c) of the Bribery Act.
